attributes.action: Act in the proper way regarding the alleged ' Cash for Honours' scandal and the apparent reluctance of the CPS to prosecute the people strongly suspected by our Police Services of having committed various offences. It is a slap in the face for all voting and tax paying residents of the UK for those in our employ to whitewash these criminal acts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Statements that don't actually request any action
